Name: Performer
About the game: Performer is a game with fun puzzles. Test your logic and ingenuity in different locations of the world as a mercenary who has to eliminate goals or steal secret developments. Solve logic tasks and get game currency for which you can open new locations or a new look of the main character. Each new location is stylized for a specific topic and contains its own mechanics, tasks. There are 3 main locations: - Shop - Office - Space
